title: Family Ties. Political Divisions.
description: For Carolyn Broe and her family, the 2022 midterms have unfolded the way they have for countless others: with great bitterness and turbulence.
media:credit: Rebecca Noble for The New York Times
media:description: Carolyn Broe, a Republican, lives in Scottsdale, Ariz., with her husband, a Libertarian, and their two adult children, who are to the left of the Democratic Party.
